description: This course covers SAP Governance , Risk and Compliance 10.0 -Introduction, Principles and Harmonization on the lines of the SAP GRC 100 course. This is the only course available currently at this price that introduces students to the basics of SAP GRC 10.0 , and the path to SAP GRC Access Control etc
title: SAP GRC 10.0 - Introduction to Principles and Harmonization
